# hpkeAuthPublicKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Authentication Services ](/documentation/authenticationservices)

- [ ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionLoginConfiguration ](/documentation/authenticationservices/asauthorizationproviderextensionloginconfiguration)

- [ hpkeAuthPublicKey ](/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionLoginConfiguration/hpkeAuthPublicKey)

- [ ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionLoginConfiguration ](/documentation/authenticationservices/asauthorizationproviderextensionloginconfiguration)

-  hpkeAuthPublicKey 

Instance Property# hpkeAuthPublicKey

macOS 15.0+

```
var hpkeAuthPublicKey: SecKey? { get set }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionLoginConfiguration/hpkeAuthPublicKey#discussion)

The Authentication public key to be used for HPKE. Setting this value with changet the mode to Auth or AuthPSK if the hpkePreSharedKey is also set. This public key is used to authenticate HPKE responses.
